short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Notify the speaker of their use of phrases to watch

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension overlays Chrome speech recognition enabled captions and notify the user when the utterance includes the string that is configured in option.
This extension make use of "Chrome speech recognition" where Google's privacy policy for the function applies.
